nav.div: Triangle Math and Science Academy » News » What's New » Corona Virus Update - Distance Learning

strong.span: TMSA Public Charter Schools Go Digital Starting on March 16, 2020

br.span: After careful consideration, TMSA Public Charter Schools Board has made the decision to move
forward due to the Covid-19 virus
This is an effort to protect our students, staff, and community, and to slow the spread of the virus.

br.strong: The distance learning will take place over four weeks:

br.span: “Asynchronous” distance learning – similar to the previous digital days format
Early Spring Break for TMSA schools
This will involve “Synchronous” or live video distance learning
During this time, we will continue to actively assess and monitor all aspects of this rapidly changing situation.
All schools will resume their normal schedules on
